content:
## Operations

* ChromeOS Device
	* Get a ChromeOS device
	* Get many ChromeOS devices
	* Update a ChromeOS device
	* Change the status of a ChromeOS device
* Group
    * Create a group
    * Delete a group
    * Get a group
    * Get many groups
    * Update a group
* User
	* Add an existing user to a group
    * Create a user
    * Delete a user
    * Get a user
    * Get many users
	* Remove a user from a group
    * Update a user
